product_name: Black Diamond Slinger Ice Axe Leash
long_description: The Black Diamond Slinger ice axe leash is a stretchy tethering system for keeping your axe attached without a wrist leash. Steel clip attaches to the spike or head of your ice axe; girth hitch the other end to your climbing harness. Elastic webbing stretches to allow maximum reach with your ice axe; elastic leash absorbs less water than a nylon leash. Black Diamond Slinger ice axe leash is rated to 2 kN.
short_description: The Black Diamond Slinger ice axe leash is a stretchy tethering system for keeping your axe attached without a wrist leash.
